select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select S.customername from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as customername, (select S.bookdate from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as bookdate, (select S.res01 from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as baozhuang, (select S.theme2 from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as bookno from etb_salesitem T where 1 = 1 and T.res02 != '1'
T.productid = #productid#
T.customerid = #customerid#
order by T.updatedate,T.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select * from ( select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select S.customername from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as customername, (select S.bookdate from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as bookdate, (select S.res01 from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as baozhuang, (select S.theme2 from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as bookno, (select S.status from etb_sales S where S.salesno = T.salesno) as status1 from etb_salesitem T where 1 = 1 and T.res02 != '1'
T.productid = #productid#
T.customerid = #customerid#
) A where 1 = 1 and A.status1 != 20 order by A.updatedate,A.id desc

select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea,
(select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01,
(select "") as customername, (select "") as bookdate from etb_salesitem T where 1 = 1 and T.status = 1
T.salesno = #salesno#
order by T.id asc

select count(*) from ( select T.*, (select C.customername from etb_customer C where C.id = T.customerid) as customername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select "") as bookdate from etb_salesitem T where 1 = 1 and T.status = 1 and T.remainquantity > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.customername like '%$customername$%'

select * from ( select T.*, (select C.customername from etb_customer C where C.id = T.customerid) as customername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select "") as bookdate from etb_salesitem T where 1 = 1 and T.status = 1 and T.remainquantity > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.customername like '%$customername$%'
order by A.customername asc, A.theme2 asc, A.productid asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from (select T.*, P.fieldno, P.tradename, P.typeno, P.color, P.packaging, P.unit, P.item10 as item01 from etb_salesitem T, etb_product P where T.productid = P.id
T.customerid = #customerid#
group by T.productid) C

select T.*, P.fieldno, P.tradename, P.typeno, P.color, P.packaging, P.unit, P.item10 as item01, P.makearea from etb_salesitem T, etb_product P where T.productid = P.id
T.customerid = #customerid#
group by T.productid order by T.updatedate desc LIMIT #start#, #end#
